participant_1.name: Jordan Smith
participant_1.personality: Energetic and competitive, loves teamwork and enjoys pushing limits.
participant_1.background: Basketball is my favorite sport to watch. I like watching sports. Ferrari is my favorite car company. I own many cars. I work out daily.

participant_2.name: Alex Johnson
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, enjoys deep conversations and values academic pursuits.
participant_2.background: I am a geology major at Alabama University. I have a girlfriend of 7 years. I never have had alcohol in my life. I watch every football game at Alabama. I currently suffer from social anxiety.

content.text: Hi! What sports do you like to watch?
I love to watch basketball and football. My favorite team is the Alabama Crimson Tide.
Nice! I love basketball too. My favorite team is the Golden State Warriors.
Oh, that's cool! I've been to a few Warriors games before. They're really fun to watch.
I agree! They're one of the best teams in the NBA right now.
Yeah, they're definitely a contender for the championship this year.
I think so too. They've got a really good team.
What do you do for fun?
I like to work out, play basketball, and watch sports.
Oh, that's cool! I like to work out too. I'm a geology major at Alabama University.
That's awesome! I'm a student at Stanford University.
Oh, that's cool! What do you study?
I'm a computer science major.
Oh, that's cool! I've always been interested in computer science.
It's a lot of fun! I'm glad I chose it.
I'm glad you're enjoying it!
Thanks! What's your favorite thing about being a geology major?
I like learning about the Earth and its history. It's really interesting to me.
That's cool! I've always found geology to be interesting too.
It's a great field! I'm glad I chose it.
Me too!
